### Summary  
Querying `r params$content` (official gene symbol) generates a short summary of the gene, its name and list of aliases, and an Entrez gene summary paragraph when available.  
  
**Gene**: `r summary_gene(input = list(content = params$content), var = "approved_symbol")`  
**Name**: `r summary_gene(input = list(content = params$content), var = "approved_name")`  
**aka**: `r summary_gene(input = list(content = params$content), var = "aka")`  
**Entrez ID**: `r as.integer(summary_gene(input = list(content = params$content), var = "ncbi_gene_id"))`
  
`r summary_gene(input = list(content = params$content), var = "entrez_summary")`
